sentences.cn: 别推, 顺次等候好了.

sentences.en: Everyone was pushing and shoving to see the prince.
sentences.cn: 大家都推着挤着要看王子。

sentences.en: Give the door a good shove .
He pushed the boat off with a shove of the pole.
sentences.cn: 他用篙一点就把船撑开了.

sentences.en: He shoved her towards the car.
Help me shove the furniture aside.
sentences.cn: 请帮我把这件家具推到旁边去.

sentences.en: Help me shove this furniture aside.
sentences.cn: 帮我把这家具推到一边去.

sentences.en: If push comes to shove, if you should lose your case in the court, what will you do?
sentences.cn: 如果情况不妙，法庭上败诉，你会怎么办？
如果你拉, 我就来推.

sentences.en: Lambert gave Luckwell a hefty shove to send him on his way.
sentences.cn: 兰伯特用力推了勒克韦尔一把，把他送上了路。

sentences.en: She gave Gracie a shove towards the house.
sentences.cn: 她猛地将格蕾西朝房子那边推了一把。

sentences.en: She will not shove the heavy load onto others.
sentences.cn: 她不愿意把重担推给别人.

sentences.en: Someone gave Phyl a shove in the back and she stumbled forward.
sentences.cn: 有人从后面推了菲儿一把,她往前冲了几步.

sentences.en: The car won't start. Can you give it a shove?
sentences.cn: 这车子启动不了.你能不能推它一把?

sentences.en: We must just shove everything in anyhow, we can repack later.
sentences.cn: 不管怎样, 我们得把所有的东西胡乱塞进去.以后我可以重新整理.

sentences.en: When push comes to shove, you are on your own.
sentences.cn: 如果形势糟糕，你就只能靠自己了。

sentences.en: Will you stuff the turkey and shove it in the oven for me?
sentences.cn: 你能帮我给火鸡填上料然后放进烤箱里吗？

sentences.en: You aren't wanted here, so shove off!
sentences.cn: 这儿不需要你, 走开!

trans.tran_en: to push someone or something in a rough or careless way, using your hands or shoulders
to push someone or something in a rough or careless way, using your hands or shoulders
to put something somewhere carelessly or without thinking much
